property.name: Rules
property.value: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Whenever a creature you control with the chosen name attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, that creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Artist
property.value: Lius Lasahido

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Creatures you control with the chosen name have "When this creature dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Seb McKinnon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if it targets a creature you control with the chosen name, you may copy that spell and may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jesper Ejsing

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) Before drawing your opening hand, choose 1, 2, or 3. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast creature spells with mana value equal to the chosen number.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Howard Lyon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Whenever a creature you control with the chosen name deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Lucas Graciano

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) At the beginning of your first upkeep, create a 1/2 white Soldier creature token with defender. At the beginning of each other player's first upkeep, that player creates a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with "This creature can't block."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason A. Engle

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) The first creature spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast. You can't cast instant or sorcery spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many attempt to speak with nature. Selvala speaks less, and nature answers more.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason Rainville

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Creatures you control with the chosen name have "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jakub Kasper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.) Creatures you control with the chosen name have "At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {G}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ryan Pancoast

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Mythic Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) Your starting deck can't have basic land cards and your starting hand size is five. Exile a card from your hand: This turn, you may play basic lands from outside the game. Basic lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Daniel Ljunggren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose two different card names. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal those names.) Whenever you cast a creature spell with one of the chosen names, you may search your library for a creature card with the other chosen name, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jesper Ejsing

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.) Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When immovable object turns to unstoppable force, it's best to just get out of the way.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jakub Kasper
